data.message:
Facebook Admins, Moderators, Mark Zuckerberg,
Although you have attended the world's best communication skills courses you have been most successful in growing great hatred and hostility between you and Muslims around the world, but seriously this time you have caused an almost unrepairable damage.
Only a few weeks after your irresponsible behavior during the Film abuser of the Prophet Muhammad events you most aggressively removed four of the largest Islamic Facebook Pages of total fans/likes over 9 million Facebook members. That happened on the morning of January 1, 2013
These four Facebook pages were totally peaceful and free of any hate speech, but you removed it ignoring the feelings of more than 9 Million Facebook Muslims and disrespecting over 1.5 Billion Muslims worldwide.
And now since that is what it had come down to you, with your irresponsibility and fake preach of freedom of speech, have left us no other choice other than permanently boycotting Facebook. And now we are giving you a 2 weeks notice - ending at midnight of Thursday, February 21, 2013. - to fulfill our demands or else we will leave Facebook for http://madina.com/.
Our demands are:
1- Reactivating the four pages that have been disabled
2- Adding a Facebook Term that illegalizes disrespecting Islamic religious symbols
3- Disabling any Facebook Page, Group, or Event that shows direct or indirect disrespect towards Islamic religious symbols
The pages that were unfairly removed are:
https://www.facebook.com/Ashraf.Elkhalq.Mohammad - About 1,500,000 Likes

replies.message:

Only a few weeks after your irresponsible behavior during the Film abuser of the Prophet Muhammad events you most aggressively removed four of the largest Islamic Facebook Pages of total fans/likes over 9 million Facebook members. That happened on the morning of January 1, 2013

These four Facebook pages were totally peaceful and free of any hate speech, but you removed it ignoring the feelings of more than 9 Million Facebook Muslims and disrespecting over 1.5 Billion Muslims worldwide.

And now since that is what it had come down to you, with your irresponsibility and fake preach of freedom of speech, have left us no other choice other than permanently boycotting Facebook. And now we are giving you a 2 weeks notice - ending at midnight of Thursday, February 21, 2013. - to fulfill our demands or else we will leave Facebook for http://madina.com/.

Our demands are:

1- Reactivating the four pages that have been disabled
2- Adding a Facebook Term that illegalizes disrespecting Islamic religious symbols
3- Disabling any Facebook Page, Group, or Event that shows direct or indirect disrespect towards Islamic religious symbols

The pages that were unfairly removed are:

https://www.facebook.com/Ashraf.Elkhalq.Mohammad - About 1,500,000 Likes
yes mr mark remove pages which disrespect islam or any other religious
jesus have to save him self
I agree with you Andrew.  This guy sounds dangerous.  With his attitude I don't think he'll get to live very long.

Don't be abusing him because of his feelings, he has a right to express it, and remember he'll die when his time comes don't force him to grave prematurely. As you are trying to say on social media you have every rights to say whatever you want. So why are you ranting on him because of that? Plz be gentle!

While some of his points are valid, demands 2 and 3 go against freedom of speech/expression. I see numerous post everyday mocking christianity and judaism.  We accept this as the person's freedom to do so. So why is it a big deal to poke fun at islam? Its kinda reverse profiling. Yes, it was wrong of them to remove these pages and they should be put back up. But the other demands are extremely hypocritical.
What do you know about Islam? All that you know about Islam isnothing but lies spoken by your corrupt media.
Islam is a sham cult made up by a child molesting murderer rapist. I'll NEVER respect them.
Don't believe it all lies Islam is hate murder pediophilia
